attributes.action: make public fools of some of the nutjobs who post bigoted and idiotic petitions on this site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This site is for serious petitions to promote democracy, but I've seen some pretty stupid ones. Petitioning the PM to make Jeremy Clarkson PM indeed! Idiots

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
